main event: An observer sighted a moving star-like source that traveled north and faded out of sight after 5 minutes on November 24, 1963.
interesting points: The observer described the phenomenon as a ball, golf type,The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes,The observer reported that the object appeared brighter than a typical star,There was another person present who witnessed the sighting,The conclusion of the report suggested it was probably a satellite.
witness description: Scott P. T., age 35, from Collinsville
